scripts.test: echo TEST; docker run -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID:${AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID} -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY:${AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY} -e AWS_SESSION_TOKEN:${AWS_SESSION_TOKEN} -e AWS_DEFAULT_REGION:${AWS_DEFAULT_REGION} -it -v ${HOME}/.aws-lambda-rie/aws-lambda-rie:/usr/local/bin/aws-lambda-rie --rm -p 9000:8080 myfunction:latest /lambda-entrypoint.sh app.handler
scripts.all: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
